physicalTable.name: SAMP_CURRENCY_D
physicalTable.description: Currency Dimension table: Stores currency conversion rate information at quarter grain

physicalColumns.name: From_Curr
physicalColumns.description: From Currency: Stores the 'From Currency' code

physicalColumns.name: To_Curr
physicalColumns.description: To Currency: Stores the 'To currency' code

physicalColumns.name: Fx_Rate
physicalColumns.description: Fx Rate: Stores FX rate as a double

physicalColumns.name: Qtr_Key
physicalColumns.description: Quarter Key: Joins to Qtr_Key of Time dimension table (Qtr grain).
